shorts.title: Insulation Expert Mike Mancuso Explains How to Lower Your Energy Bill Through Proper Installation in HelloNation
shorts.title_distilled: Insulation Expert Mike Mancuso Explains How to Lower Your Energy Bill Through Proper Installation in HelloNation.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, Pa., Aug. 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- How does insulation lower your energy bill? According to HelloNation , the answer is rooted in how heat moves and how insulation slows that process....
shorts.content: SCRANTON, Pa., Aug. 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- How does insulation lower your energy bill? According to HelloNation , the answer is rooted in how heat moves and how insulation slows that process....

shorts.title: Pennsylvania Democrat Paige Cognetti joins 2026 race for Congress
shorts.title_distilled: Pennsylvania Democrat Paige Cognetti joins 2026 race for Congress.
shorts.description: Democrats need three seats to flip control of the House and party leaders say the road to the majority likely goes through Pennsylvania. Paige Cognetti is the latest candidate to announce a bid.
shorts.content: Democrats need three seats to flip control of the House and party leaders say the road to the majority likely goes through Pennsylvania. Paige Cognetti is the latest candidate to announce a bid.
shorts.content_distilled: Democrats need three seats to flip control of the House and party leaders say the road to the majority likely goes through Pennsylvania.

shorts.title: H.S. FOOTBALL: ‘X’ marks the spot as Cougars blank West Scranton
shorts.description: HAZLETON — Hazleton Area found the cure for its offensive doldrums on Friday night: keep giving the ball to Xavier Heck. Feed it to him some more. And again. Then hope like Heck that he gets his hands on the ball on defense. The sophomore running back simply known as ‘X’ to his teammates and coaches wound up with career highs in carries (21), rushing yards (224), yards per carry (10.7) and touchdowns (four) as the Cougars blanked West Scranton, 40-0, in their home opener for their first win under rookie head coach Scott Sacco. “”I just had to trust […]

shorts.title: SWB RAILRIDERS: Two big innings carry Worcester to victory
shorts.title_distilled: SWB RAILRIDERS: Two big innings carry Worcester to victory.
shorts.description: Worcester jumped out to a lead in the bottom of the first inning and never looked back Friday as the Red Sox downed the Scranton/Wilkes-Barre RailRiders, 7-4, at Polar Park in Massachusetts. The RailRiders (80-53 overall) had their three-game winning streak, six-game road winning streak and seven-game winning streak against Worcester halted. They are 42-19 in the International League second half and hold a four-game lead over second-place Syracuse after the Mets split a doubleheader at Buffalo. Fourteen games remain in the regular season. Nathan Hickey had a two-run double, Trayce Thompson a RBI double and Tyler McDonough a RBI […]
shorts.content: Worcester jumped out to a lead in the bottom of the first inning and never looked back Friday as the Red Sox downed the Scranton/Wilkes-Barre RailRiders, 7-4, at Polar Park in Massachusetts. shorts.title: HS ROUNDUP: Scranton Prep earns win over Montrose in girls tennis
shorts.title_distilled: HS ROUNDUP: Scranton Prep earns win over Montrose in girls tennis.
shorts.description: Hannah LaCoe and Emma Cuck captured singles wins, and the doubles teams both won to lead Scranton Prep to a 4-1 win over Montrose on Friday afternoon in Lackawanna League girls tennis. LaCoe gave Scranton Prep the early lead with a straight-sets win over Erin Tillotson, 6-0, 6-1. LaCoe, who played mostly doubles during the Classics’ runs to the PIAA Class 2A championship in 2023 and a runner-up finish last season, is undefeated at No. 3 singles this season. “It felt really amazing,” LaCoe said. “I knew it was going to be a tough match, but it was really important […]
shorts.content: Hannah LaCoe and Emma Cuck captured singles wins, and the doubles teams both won to lead Scranton Prep to a 4-1 win over Montrose on Friday afternoon in Lackawanna League girls tennis.
